thread.section_title: LightInTheBox 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 LightInTheBox 的点评意见 | www.lightinthebox.com | 368 5
thread.title: Heidi

author: Heidi
title: Heidi
text: I'm a Canadian in my 30s and wear a US size 2 shoe. I love this place for buying high heels that fit. Orders take a LONG time to arrive, but I believe they're overseas so I understand. I don't buy purses from here anymore as I've found them to break quite easily. Shoes are typically great, though, if you have small feet. If you don't have small feet, just go to a regular shoe store as it won't be worth the wait.
